alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 11 at 2:34PM MDT until October 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Generally 4 to 8 inches expected above 8,000 feet. Totals around 12 inches across the highest terrain. * WHERE...Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hunters and others heading into the backcountry should prepare for wet and cold conditions. Wet snow could make for difficult travel on unpaved mountain roads, especially above 8,000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
